item.title: Interface not working?
item.dc:creator: @M0R3TANK1NG M0R3TANK1NG
item.description:
@M0R3TANK1NG wrote:

Hey everyone

I was testing some things, and this didn’t work for me?

This is done on an InnovationX source and client which I downloaded to look at because I was bored. I went into the Client.java and I was interested to see how they did the pets for donors back in the day, I attempted to do my own and this happened:

if (NpcType == 198) { if(HasItemAmount(600, 1)) { showDialogue("You already have one of these books, my friend."); return; } showDialogue("He remains quiet, and hands you dat book."); addItem(600, 1);

When I click on the NPC, which I just randomly spawned in using ::npc 198 1 it wouldn’t give me the item I wanted (book).

What am i doing wrong??

Read full topic
